Plot: A New York woman (who doesn't really have an apartment) apprentices for a dance company (though she's not really a dancer) and throws herself headlong into her dreams, even as the possibility of realizing them dwindles.
Title: Frances Ha
Awards: Nominated for 1 Golden Globe. Another 1 win & 47 nominations.
Actors: Greta Gerwig, Mickey Sumner, Michael Esper, Adam Driver
